name: ArmedArea_chs
description:
Made By XiaoTangyuan

Credits: Haotian-Ding(Program) Huadi(Art)

This is a Game Developed in GGJ 2019

The Gamejam Theme was "The meaning of Home"

This is what I think home for an Otaku

Do Everything without standing up from your seat.

Drag&Drop on the Character to throw things to complete missions.

Make sure the target object (with 4 arrows) move to the target spot(circle area)

There are 8 stages:

1 Throw the snack bag to trash bin

2 Get the guitar

3 Move the glass to wash stand

4 Get the glass

5 Get the Cola(I love Pepsi)

6 Move the watering pot to wash stand

7 Water the flowers

8 Get the teeth brushing set
